callExec.title: $exec call
callExec.description: call function or method in $exec instruction; keyword should replace the instruction with the result or with the promise

getRef.title: $ref to the part of the script
getRef.description: Keyword should replace $ref instruction with the result of the script evaluation at this position

getData.title: $data reference to the part of the data instance
getData.description: Keyword should replace $data instruction with the data value at the position defined by JSON-pointer

thenValidate.title: 'promise' validation
thenValidate.description: Validates the resolved value of the 'promise' and replaces the data with chained 'promise'. If the date is not a promise validates it immediately. Please not that the keyword itself executes synchronously.

objectToPromise.title: Object to promise
objectToPromise.description: Merge object properties to a single promise

itemsSerial.title: sequential evaluation
itemsSerial.description: Keyword should replace the array with the promise that resolves to array of results, but instructions should only be executed after the previous one completes
